alert.note: Alert for Holmes; Medina; Stark; Summit; Wayne (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 13 at 11:34PM EDT until June 14 at 12:45AM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Medina County in northeastern Ohio... Southwestern Stark County in northeastern Ohio... South central Summit County in northeastern Ohio... Wayne County in northeastern Ohio... Holmes County in northeastern Ohio... * Until 1245 AM EDT. * At 1134 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles southeast of Wellington to near Polk to near Mansfield, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Canton, Wooster, Millersburg, Massillon, Green, Wadsworth, North Canton, Orrville, Berlin, Rittman, Walnut Creek, Doylestown, Loudonville, Creston, Brewster, Navarre, Dalton, Shreve, Waynesburg and East Sparta. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
